sentences.en: After a little while, the English teacher turned off an epigram.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿, 英文老师作出了一首讽刺诗.

sentences.en: He has a genius for epigram.
Tito was ready, and scarified the epigram to Scala's content.
sentences.cn: 蒂托是有准备的, 他牺牲了这首诗来满足斯卡拉.

sentences.en: We must bear in mind this instructive epigram.
sentences.cn: 这句警语有很强的指导作用,要牢记在心.

trans.tran_cn: 机智的短诗，警句，讽刺诗
trans.tran_en: a short sentence that expresses an idea in a clever or amusing way
